title: Shakira’s 2025 North American Tour: Last-Minute Ticket Deals, Dates & What to Expect
description: The Latin pop star is set to bring her "Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran World Tour" to North America. Here's everything you need to know. Shakira’s 2025 North American Tour: Last-Minute Ticket Deals, Dates & What to Expect Consequence Staff
author: Consequence Staff
excerpt: Shakira set to bring her "Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran World Tour" to North America. Learn how to get last-minute tickets and everything else you need to know.
text: Shakira’s “Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran World Tour” is coming to North America in what promises to be one of the biggest concert events of 2025. After electrifying audiences in Latin America, the global superstar is bringing her spectacular production to major stadiums across the United States and Canada, supporting her critically acclaimed 2024 album Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran. The North American leg kicks off this May 13th in Charlotte, North Carolina, followed by shows in New York, Boston, Miami, Houston, Los Angeles, and many more cities. Get Shakira Tickets Here With many dates already experiencing high demand and resale prices climbing, fans are scrambling to secure their spot at this cultural phenomenon. This comprehensive guide provides complete tour dates, expected setlist information, production details, and proven strategies to score tickets before they’re gone. Fast Facts Tour Dates: May 13th through June 30, 2025 Venues: Major stadiums and arenas across North America (20+ dates) Tour Significance: First major world tour since 2018’s” El Dorado World Tour.” First Latin female act to headline Fenway Park in Boston; Bank of America Stadium in Charlotte; Globe Life Field in Arlington. Tickets: Look for Last Minute Deals on StubHub Complete 2025 Tour Dates & Cities The “Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran World Tour” North American leg includes these confirmed dates: May 2025 05/13 – Charlotte, NC @ Bank of America Stadium (Get Tickets) 05/15 – East Rutherford, NJ @ MetLife Stadium (Get Tickets) 05/16 – East Rutherford, NJ @ MetLife Stadium (Get Tickets) 05/20 – Montreal, QC @ Bell Centre (Get Tickets) 05/22 – Detroit, MI @ Little Caesars Arena (Get Tickets) 05/24 – Chicago, IL @ Sueños Festival (Get Tickets) 05/26 – Toronto, ON @ Scotiabank Arena (Get Tickets) 05/29 – Boston, MA @ Fenway Park (Get Tickets) 05/31 – Washington, DC @ Nationals Park (Get Tickets) June 2025 06/02 – Atlanta, GA @ State Farm Arena (Get Tickets) 06/04 – Orlando, FL @ Camping World Stadium (Get Tickets) 06/06 – Miami, FL @ Hard Rock Stadium (Get Tickets) 06/07 – Miami, FL @ Hard Rock Stadium (Get Tickets) 06/11 – Arlington, TX @ Globe Life Field (Get Tickets) 06/13 – San Antonio, TX @ Alamodome (Get Tickets) 06/15 – Houston, TX @ Toyota Center (Get Tickets) 06/16 – Houston, TX @ Toyota Center (Get Tickets) 06/20 – Inglewood, CA @ SoFi Stadium (Get Tickets) 06/22 – Phoenix, AZ @ Footprint Center (Get Tickets) 06/23 – Phoenix, AZ @ Footprint Center (Get Tickets) 06/26 – San Diego, CA @ SnapDragon Stadium (Get Tickets) 06/28 – Las Vegas, NV @ Allegiant Stadium (Get Tickets) 06/30 – San Francisco, CA @ Oracle Park (Get Tickets)Shakira, photo by Nicolas Gerardin Anticipated Setlist For her “Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran World Tour,” Shakira is expected to deliver a career-spanning setlist that blends her newest material with her iconic hits. Fans can expect to hear tracks from her latest album including “TQG,” “Copa Vacía,” and “Bzrp Music Sessions, Vol. 53,” alongside classics like “Hips Don’t Lie,” “Whenever, Wherever,” “She Wolf,” and “Waka Waka.” Her Latin American shows have also featured fan favorites such as “La Tortura,” “Antología,” and “Ojos Así,” creating a perfect balance between her Spanish and English catalogs. The production showcases Shakira’s signature dance moves, multiple costume changes, and her skills as a multi-instrumentalist, delivering an electrifying experience that celebrates her unique fusion of Latin rhythms, pop sensibilities, and rock influences. For Shakira’s tour specifically: 5-7 Days Before: Initial price stability with occasional drops 72 Hours Out: Slight decrease as sellers become motivated Day-of-Show: Potential for significant drops (high-risk strategy) VIP Packages For fans seeking premium experiences, Shakira’s “Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran World Tour” offers several official VIP packages through VIP Nation. These packages range from exclusive meet-and-greet opportunities to special merchandise bundles: Official VIP Offerings ULTIMATE MEET & GREET VIP PACKAGE Each Ultimate Meet & Greet VIP Package includes: One reserved ticket in the front row OR one general admission standing ticket with early entry into the Wolf Den* Meet & Greet and photo opportunity with SHAKIRA** Autographed item Access to the pre-show VIP lounge including: Assortment of appetizers Two drink tickets for beer, wine, and soft drinks*** Photobooth opportunity to commemorate your evening**** Themed decor and party music playing your favorite Shakira hits One parking pass per order (where available) Exclusive VIP merchandise item Commemorative VIP laminate and lanyard Pre-show tour merchandise shopping opportunity On-site VIP host and check-in VIP LOUNGE PACKAGE Each VIP Lounge Package includes: One premium reserved ticket* Access to the pre-show VIP lounge including: Assortment of appetizers Two drink tickets for beer, wine, and soft drinks** Photobooth opportunity to commemorate your evening*** Themed decor and party music playing your favorite Shakira hits Exclusive VIP merchandise item Commemorative VIP laminate and lanyard Pre-show tour merchandise shopping opportunity On-site VIP host and check-in GOLD HOT TICKET PACKAGE Each Gold Hot Ticket Package includes: One premium reserved ticket* Exclusive VIP merchandise item Commemorative VIP laminate and lanyard Pre-show tour merchandise shopping opportunity On-site VIP host and check-in WOLF DEN PACKAGE Each Wolf Den Package includes: One general admission standing ticket with early entry into the Wolf Den* Exclusive VIP merchandise item Commemorative VIP laminate and lanyard Pre-show tour merchandise shopping opportunity On-site VIP host and check-in *Locations may vary by venue, see specific dates for details. **Groups of 2 or more. ***Local liquor laws apply. ****No Artist participation. html:
Shakira’s “Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran World Tour” is coming to North America in what promises to be one of the biggest concert events of 2025. After electrifying audiences in Latin America, the global superstar is bringing her spectacular production to major stadiums across the United States and Canada, supporting her critically acclaimed 2024 album Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran. The North American leg kicks off this May 13th in Charlotte, North Carolina, followed by shows in New York, Boston, Miami, Houston, Los Angeles, and many more cities.

Get Shakira Tickets Here

With many dates already experiencing high demand and resale prices climbing, fans are scrambling to secure their spot at this cultural phenomenon. This comprehensive guide provides complete tour dates, expected setlist information, production details, and proven strategies to score tickets before they’re gone.

Fast Facts

Tour Dates: May 13th through June 30, 2025
Venues: Major stadiums and arenas across North America (20+ dates)
Tour Significance: First major world tour since 2018’s” El Dorado World Tour.” First Latin female act to headline Fenway Park in Boston; Bank of America Stadium in Charlotte; Globe Life Field in Arlington.
Tickets: Look for Last Minute Deals on StubHub

Complete 2025 Tour Dates & Cities

The “Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran World Tour” North American leg includes these confirmed dates:

May 2025

05/13 – Charlotte, NC @ Bank of America Stadium (Get Tickets)
05/15 – East Rutherford, NJ @ MetLife Stadium (Get Tickets)
05/16 – East Rutherford, NJ @ MetLife Stadium (Get Tickets)
05/20 – Montreal, QC @ Bell Centre (Get Tickets)
05/22 – Detroit, MI @ Little Caesars Arena (Get Tickets)
05/24 – Chicago, IL @ Sueños Festival (Get Tickets)
05/26 – Toronto, ON @ Scotiabank Arena (Get Tickets)
05/29 – Boston, MA @ Fenway Park (Get Tickets)
05/31 – Washington, DC @ Nationals Park (Get Tickets)

June 2025

06/02 – Atlanta, GA @ State Farm Arena (Get Tickets)
06/04 – Orlando, FL @ Camping World Stadium (Get Tickets)
06/06 – Miami, FL @ Hard Rock Stadium (Get Tickets)
06/07 – Miami, FL @ Hard Rock Stadium (Get Tickets)
06/11 – Arlington, TX @ Globe Life Field (Get Tickets)
06/13 – San Antonio, TX @ Alamodome (Get Tickets)
06/15 – Houston, TX @ Toyota Center (Get Tickets)
06/16 – Houston, TX @ Toyota Center (Get Tickets)
06/20 – Inglewood, CA @ SoFi Stadium (Get Tickets)
06/22 – Phoenix, AZ @ Footprint Center (Get Tickets)
06/23 – Phoenix, AZ @ Footprint Center (Get Tickets)
06/26 – San Diego, CA @ SnapDragon Stadium (Get Tickets)
06/28 – Las Vegas, NV @ Allegiant Stadium (Get Tickets)
06/30 – San Francisco, CA @ Oracle Park (Get Tickets)

Shakira, photo by Nicolas Gerardin

Anticipated Setlist

For her “Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran World Tour,” Shakira is expected to deliver a career-spanning setlist that blends her newest material with her iconic hits. Fans can expect to hear tracks from her latest album including “TQG,” “Copa Vacía,” and “Bzrp Music Sessions, Vol. 53,” alongside classics like “Hips Don’t Lie,” “Whenever, Wherever,” “She Wolf,” and “Waka Waka.” Her Latin American shows have also featured fan favorites such as “La Tortura,” “Antología,” and “Ojos Así,” creating a perfect balance between her Spanish and English catalogs. The production showcases Shakira’s signature dance moves, multiple costume changes, and her skills as a multi-instrumentalist, delivering an electrifying experience that celebrates her unique fusion of Latin rhythms, pop sensibilities, and rock influences.

Buy Shakira Tickets Here

Why StubHub is Your Best Last-Minute Option to Get Tickets

Fans can look for great last-minute Shakira ticket deals on StubHub, where your purchase is guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand. VIP packages are also available.

The StubHub Advantage for Last-Minute Buyers

Dynamic Listings: StubHub’s platform updates continuously as new tickets become available
Mobile-Optimized Experience: Perfect for on-the-go purchasing decisions
Instant Digital Delivery: No waiting for physical tickets to arrive
Price Drop Alerts: Notification system to catch when seats hit your target price

Current Ticket Market Analysis

Based on current market data for Shakira’s “Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran World Tour”:

Premium Floor/Pit: $350-500+ (dance along with the Queen of Latin Pop)
Lower Bowl Sections: $200-350 (perfect balance of view and atmosphere)
Mid-Level Seating: $150-250 (elevated perspective of the visual spectacle)
Upper Levels: $80-150 (still part of the electric atmosphere)

City-by-City Strategy Guide

Understanding Venue Dynamics

Each stadium on the tour has unique characteristics that impact ticket availability:

High-Demand Markets: Miami, New York, Los Angeles (expect higher prices)
Multiple Show Cities: Look for better deals on second show dates
Latin Pop Hub Cities: Cities with large Latin American populations will have higher demand

The Last-Minute Pricing Pattern

Ticket pricing typically follows a predictable pattern for stadium tours. For Shakira’s tour specifically:

5-7 Days Before: Initial price stability with occasional drops
72 Hours Out: Slight decrease as sellers become motivated
Day-of-Show: Potential for significant drops (high-risk strategy)

VIP Packages

For fans seeking premium experiences, Shakira’s “Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran World Tour” offers several official VIP packages through VIP Nation. These packages range from exclusive meet-and-greet opportunities to special merchandise bundles:

Official VIP Offerings

ULTIMATE MEET & GREET VIP PACKAGE Each Ultimate Meet & Greet VIP Package includes:

  • One reserved ticket in the front row OR one general admission standing ticket with early entry into the Wolf Den*
  • Meet & Greet and photo opportunity with SHAKIRA**
  • Autographed item
  • Access to the pre-show VIP lounge including:
    • Assortment of appetizers
    • Two drink tickets for beer, wine, and soft drinks***
    • Photobooth opportunity to commemorate your evening****
    • Themed decor and party music playing your favorite Shakira hits
  • One parking pass per order (where available)
  • Exclusive VIP merchandise item
  • Commemorative VIP laminate and lanyard
  • Pre-show tour merchandise shopping opportunity
  • On-site VIP host and check-in

VIP LOUNGE PACKAGE Each VIP Lounge Package includes:

  • One premium reserved ticket*
  • Access to the pre-show VIP lounge including:
    • Assortment of appetizers
    • Two drink tickets for beer, wine, and soft drinks**
    • Photobooth opportunity to commemorate your evening***
    • Themed decor and party music playing your favorite Shakira hits
  • Exclusive VIP merchandise item
  • Commemorative VIP laminate and lanyard
  • Pre-show tour merchandise shopping opportunity
  • On-site VIP host and check-in

GOLD HOT TICKET PACKAGE Each Gold Hot Ticket Package includes:

  • One premium reserved ticket*
  • Exclusive VIP merchandise item
  • Commemorative VIP laminate and lanyard
  • Pre-show tour merchandise shopping opportunity
  • On-site VIP host and check-in

WOLF DEN PACKAGE Each Wolf Den Package includes:

  • One general admission standing ticket with early entry into the Wolf Den*
  • Exclusive VIP merchandise item
  • Commemorative VIP laminate and lanyard
  • Pre-show tour merchandise shopping opportunity
  • On-site VIP host and check-in

*Locations may vary by venue, see specific dates for details.
**Groups of 2 or more.
***Local liquor laws apply.
****No Artist participation.

Expert Ticket-Buying Moves

The Section Split Strategy: Sometimes purchasing two separate pairs in the same section is cheaper than four together
The Patience Advantage: Prices often fluctuate multiple times daily
The Alternative Date Gambit: Consider traveling to a nearby city for better deals
The Incomplete Set Technique: Look for “orphaned” single seats at reduced prices
The Weekday Discount: Weeknight shows typically offer better value than weekend performances

The Concert Code

Essential Gear:

Portable charger (for ticket access and social sharing)
Weather-appropriate clothing (many venues are outdoors)
Comfortable shoes (you’ll be dancing all night)
Cash backup (though most venues are cashless)
ID matching your ticket purchase

Show Night Etiquette:

Arrive early—stadium entry takes time
Respect the dancing space—everyone deserves room to move
Hydrate smart—Shakira shows are high-energy
Sing along—her shows are known for passionate crowd participation

Updated for real-time accuracy. Price ranges based on tour data and market analysis as of May 2025
